verses.verse: לְדָוִ֗ד <WH1732> of David מִ֫זְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm נְאֻ֤ם <WH5002> said יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD לַֽאדֹנִ֗י <WH113> unto my Lord שֵׁ֥ב <WH3427> Sit לִֽימִינִ֑י <WH3225> thou at my right hand עַד־ <WH5704> Until אָשִׁ֥ית <WH7896> until I make אֹ֝יְבֶ֗יךָ <WH341> thine enemies הֲדֹ֣ם <WH1916> stool לְרַגְלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH7272> your feet

מַטֵּֽה־ <WH4294> the rod עֻזְּךָ֗ <WH5797> of thy strength יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> shall send יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> The LORD מִצִּיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> out of Zion רְ֝דֵ֗ה <WH7287> rule בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> thou in the midst אֹיְבֶֽיךָ׃ <WH341> of thine enemies

עַמְּךָ֣ <WH5971> Thy people נְדָבֹת֮ <WH5071> [shall be] willing בְּי֪וֹם <WH3117> in the day חֵ֫ילֶ֥ךָ <WH2428> of thy power בְּֽהַדְרֵי־ <WH1926> in the beauties קֹ֭דֶשׁ <WH6944> of holiness מֵרֶ֣חֶם <WH7358> from the womb מִשְׁחָ֑ר <WH4891> of the morning לְ֝ךָ֗ טַ֣ל <WH2919> thou hast the dew יַלְדֻתֶֽיךָ׃ <WH3208> of thy youth

נִשְׁבַּ֤ע <WH7650> hath sworn יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> The LORD וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> and will not יִנָּחֵ֗ם <WH5162> and will not repent אַתָּֽה־ <WH859> you כֹהֵ֥ן <WH3548> Thou [art] a priest לְעוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever עַל־ <WH5921> According דִּ֝בְרָתִ֗י <WH1700> after the order מַלְכִּי־ צֶֽדֶק׃ <WH4442> of Melchizedek

אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> The Lord עַל־ <WH5921> is at יְמִֽינְךָ֑ <WH3225> at thy right hand מָחַ֖ץ <WH4272> shall strike בְּיוֹם־ <WH3117> in the day אַפּ֣וֹ <WH639> of his wrath מְלָכִֽים׃ <WH4428> through kings

יָדִ֣ין <WH1777> He shall judge בַּ֭גּוֹיִם <WH1471> among the heathen מָלֵ֣א <WH4390> he shall fill גְוִיּ֑וֹת <WH1472> [the places] with the dead bodies מָ֥חַץ <WH4272> he shall wound רֹ֝֗אשׁ <WH7218> the heads עַל־ <WH5921> over אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> countries רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> over many

מִ֭נַּחַל <WH5158> of the brook בַּדֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> in the way יִשְׁתֶּ֑ה <WH8354> He shall drink עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֝֗ן <WH3651> after that יָרִ֥ים <WH7311> therefore shall he lift up רֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> the head
